name: The 12th Int'l Conference on Information Technology in Education
content: The 12th Int'l Conference on Information Technology in Education (CITE 2024) will be held during March 29-31, 2024 in Suzhou, China. This Conference will cover issues on Information Technology in Education, and other related topics. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
